tool_description: Fetch the latest ethereum gas price
name: Ethereum gas price
title: Ethereum gas price

api_list.name: Fetch gas price
api_list.description: API endpoint to fetch latest gas price on ethereum network
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ethereum-gas-price.p.rapidapi.com/api/fetch-gas"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum-gas-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ethereum-gas-price.p.rapidapi.com/api/fetch-gas"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum-gas-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
